item.title: Web Runner
item.description: You know the drill. The galactic webs have been invaded by evil aliens,and it’s your job to take them out. Piloting the latest in fighter craft you must clear the web of ever more deadly enemies. Web Runner is a classic retro styled tube shooter made as my November entry for One Game a Month 2013.
